game.name: Two Worlds II - Echoes of the Dark Past Soundtrack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Enjoy Antaloor apart from visuals: with the Two Worlds II: Echoes of the Dark Past Soundtrack! The epic, atmospherically toned music will be a feast for your ears.
